attributes.action: Disolve HM Government and hold a new General Election
attributes.additional_details: We are human beings and this Government are treating us like worthless animals, you as a Government work FOR us you are suposed to serve us we did not elect you this Government was formed becuase of a hung parliment the mess this Government has caused and the embarasment they have caused the UK world wide with u-turn after u-turn we have no money people are having pays cut benefits cut yet our fantastic Government give to third world countrys who frankly do not really see the money and we don't see the MP's taking a pay cut enough is enough we simply can not allow this Government to continue the balme game its Labours fault is not an excuse anymore they have been in power for two and half year we can not allow them to stay full term, so the signatories call for a vote of No Confidence. in Her majesty's Government and demand that Parliament be dissolved and a General Election called for at once. ENOUGH IS ENOUGH NO MORE!
